short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable focus mode on YouTube by hiding Shorts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you want to focus on YouTube videos but Shorts are too distracting, this minimalist extension should help you by hiding them from the main page.

To display Shorts again, click on the Extension icon or press Control+B (on PC) or Command+B (on Mac).
